meanings.definition: Pharmacologists: experts in the study of drugs and their effects on the body.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacologists conducted research on new medications.
meanings.sent2: Many pharmacologists work in laboratories to develop safer drugs.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacologists joked that they were like detectives investigating how drugs work.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, pharmacologists are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacologists' knowledge of drugs is unmatched in the medical field.

meanings.definition: Pharmacologists: those who specialize in the field of pharmacology.
meanings.sent1: My cousin is a pharmacologist and teaches about drugs at the university.
meanings.sent2: Pharmacologists play a crucial role in ensuring the safety of medications.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacologists at the conference shared exciting breakthroughs in drug research.
meanings.sent4: To understand the complexity of drugs, one must consult a pharmacologist.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacologists' dedication to their work is truly admirable.
